title: Expenses of court proceeding
context: [ยง236D-16] Expenses of court proceeding. Whenever a circuit court certifies that there was probable cause for issuing a citation and taking proceedings under this chapter, the director of finance shall pay from the tax reserve fund provided in section 231-23&copy;(2), or allow, all expenses incurred for services of citation and other lawful disbursements that have not otherwise been paid. [L 1983, c 217, pt of ยง1] Revision Note Section &ldquo;231-23&copy;(2)&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;231-23(d)(2)&rdquo;.
